amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriations (by transfer) for the National Oceanic and Atmosperic Administration (NOAA), and increase appropriations for a FBI pilot program by $16 million.

action.text: Mr. Obey raised a point of order against the Rogers (MI) amendment (A007). Mr. Obey stated that the provisions of the Rogers (MI) amendment seek to appropriate funds for a program not authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
